00053 void BdkPdf3Gauss::init(const char * theName,
00054                         const char * theDesc,
00055                         RooRealVar & dt) {
00056 //
00057 // Initialization
00058 //
00059     baseInit(theName, theDesc);
00060     setDependent(dt);
00061     initParameters();
00062 }
00063 
00064 void BdkPdf3Gauss::setDependent(RooRealVar & dt) {
00065 //
00066 // set dependent
00067 //
00068     setIsValid(kFALSE);
00069     _dt = &dt;
00070 }
00071 
00072 void BdkPdf3Gauss::initParameters() {
00073 //
00074 // Initialize parameters 
00075 // The parameter variables are actually created here.
00076 //
00077     setIsValid(kFALSE);
00078     
00079     // now define the RooVars
00080     _f1 = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".f1",
00081                          "First Gaussian Fraction",
00082                          0.5,0.,1.);
00083     _f2 = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".f2",
00084                          "Second Gaussian Fraction",
00085                          0.4,0.,1.);
00086     _b1 = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".b1",
00087                          "First Gaussian Bias",
00088                          0.);
00089     _s1 = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".s1",
00090                          "First Gaussian Scale Factor",
00091                          1.);
00092     _b2 = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".b2",
00093                          "Second Gaussian Bias",
00094                          0.);
00095     _s2 = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".s2",
00096                          "Second Gaussian Scale Factor",
00097                          2.);
00098     _b3 = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".b3",
00099                          "Third Gaussian Bias",
00100                          0.);
00101     _s3 = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".s3",
00102                          "Third Gaussian Scale Factor",
00103                          3.);
00104   
00105     // set reasonable errors as first steps
00106     _f1->setConstant(kFALSE);
00107     _f2->setConstant(kFALSE);
00108     _b1->setConstant(kFALSE);
00109     _s1->setConstant(kFALSE);
00110     _b2->setConstant(kFALSE);
00111     _s2->setConstant(kFALSE);
00112     _b3->setConstant(kFALSE);
00113     _s3->setConstant(kFALSE);
00114         
00115     _f1->setError(0.05);
00116     _f2->setError(0.05);
00117     _b1->setError(0.05);
00118     _s1->setError(0.05);
00119     _b2->setError(0.05);
00120     _s2->setError(0.05);
00121     _b3->setError(0.05);
00122     _s3->setError(0.05);
00123 }
00124 
00125 void BdkPdf3Gauss::createPdf() {
00126 //
00127 // Build the pdf.
00128 //    
00129 
00130     _g1 = new RooGaussian(TString(GetName())+".g1","First Gaussian", 
00131                          *_dt, *_b1, *_s1);
00132     _g2 = new RooGaussian(TString(GetName())+".g2","Second Gaussian", 
00133                          *_dt, *_b2, *_s2);
00134     _g3 = new RooGaussian(TString(GetName())+".g3","Third Gaussian", 
00135                          *_dt, *_b3, *_s3);
00136     _thePdf = new RooAddModel(TString(GetName())+".Pdf",
00137                               TString(GetTitle())+" Pdf",
00138                               RooArgList(*_g1,*_g2,*_g3),
00139                               RooArgList(*_f1,*_f2));
00140     
00141     setIsValid(kTRUE);
00142 }
00143 
00144 
00145 
00146 void BdkPdf3Gauss::linkResolution(const BdkPdf3Gauss & pdf2) {
00147 //
00148 // Link all resolution parameters of the two pdfs.
00149 //
00150     setIsValid(kFALSE);
00151     linkResolution(pdf2._f1 , pdf2._f2,
00152                    pdf2._b1 , pdf2._s1,
00153                    pdf2._b2 , pdf2._s2,
00154                    pdf2._b3 , pdf2._s3);
00155 }
00156 
00157 void BdkPdf3Gauss::linkResolution(RooRealVar *f1, RooRealVar *f2,
00158                                   RooRealVar *b1,  RooRealVar *s1,
00159                                   RooRealVar *b2,  RooRealVar *s2,
00160                                   RooRealVar *b3,  RooRealVar *s3) {
00161 //
00162 // Link the resolution parameters which are not set to 0.
00163 //
00164     setIsValid(kFALSE);
00165     if ( f1 != 0 ) {_f1 = f1;}
00166     if ( f2 != 0 ) {_f2 = f2;}
00167     if ( b1 != 0 ) {_b1 = b1;}
00168     if ( s1 != 0 ) {_s1 = s1;}
00169     if ( b2 != 0 ) {_b2 = b2;}
00170     if ( s2 != 0 ) {_s2 = s2;}
00171     if ( b3 != 0 ) {_b3 = b3;}
00172     if ( s3 != 0 ) {_s3 = s3;}
00173 }
00174 
00175 RooArgSet BdkPdf3Gauss::dependents() {
00176 //
00177 // Get dependent.
00178 //    
00179     return RooArgSet(*_dt);
00180 }
